original_text: But what is God's reply to him? “I have kept for myself seven thousand men who have not bowed the knee to Baal.”
korean_text: 그에게 하신 대답이 무엇이냐 내가 나를 위하여 바알에게 무릎을 꿇지 아니한 사람 칠천 명을 남겨 두었다 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: But what is God's reply to him?
I have kept for myself seven thousand men
who have not bowed the knee to Baal
